@eno @dguy Updated. Also updated #2774 
The build is quite unstable lately -- I did rebase this branch to get latest test fixed for trunk -- the other PR did have 3 green build (before the latest update). Hope it will pass now.
@ijuma : Thanks for the patch. LGTM
@enothereska @dguy Did rebase to tricker new build... Keeping fingers crossed!

@gwenshap and @ijuma might be the most immediately interested in getting this in -- it automates a bunch of the steps in https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/KAFKA/Release+Process when generating RCs. There's an incomplete branch in there for promoting RCs, partly due to lack of time and partly due to being unable to automate all of it for non-PMC members.
@mjsax : Thanks for the patch. LGTM

Since @gwenshap is doing the bug fix release soon, maybe she can test drive this and merge it.

Yes -- I am aware of that. This is only about timeouts -- by default, we commit every 30 seconds, and ofter tests wait for 30 seconds to receive output -- reducing commit interval should stabilize (and maybe speed up) the tests by avoiding race conditions.

A streams bug failed jenkins:
```
org.apache.kafka.streams.StreamsConfigTest > shouldSupportPrefixedRestoreConsumerConfigs PASSED
pure virtual method called
terminate called without an active exception
:streams:unitTest FAILED
```
retest this please
